testcase.name: valid login
testcase.system-out: Given user should be on login page..........................................passed When user enters valid credentials and click on login button................passed Then user should be navigate to home page...................................passed And user can see logout link on home page...................................passed

testcase.name: invalid login
testcase.system-out: Given user should be on login page..........................................passed When user enters invalid credentials and click on login button..............passed Then user can see the error message on login page...........................passed
